DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study assess effectiveness Navigator program aid clinical trial participation amongst Chinese demographic
DOC.brief_title: Overcoming Obstacles Clinical Trials Enrollment Through Navigator Program
DOC.criteria: Cancer patient Focus Group must meet following criterion : diagnosis gynecologic breast cancer pursue treatment Stanford within last 2 year must read speak Chinese willing able participant group discussion Cancer patient receive Navigator Support must meet following criterion : Newly diagnose gynecologic breast cancer pursue treatment Stanford Cancer Center must read speak Chinese willing able individual relationship Navigator Health Professional must meet following criterion : must currently work Stanford gynecologic Oncology Clinic Navigators must meet following criterion : Chinese English speaking willing able participate training serve Navigator preferably Cancer survivor Cancer patient must GOG performance status 02 ( see attach document detail ) . Focus Group participate MAY able participate another study patient already participate clinical trial assign Navigator . No Exclusionary criterion Health Professionals Navigators .
